mapper.select: SELECT SUM(warehoused_quantity) FROM input WHERE warehoused_date = CURRENT_DATE()
SELECT SUM(release_quantity) FROM output WHERE release_date = CURRENT_DATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM output WHERE status = '대기중' AND release_date = CURRENT_DATE()
SELECT c.item_classification, i.stock FROM classification c JOIN inventory i ON c.code = i.code
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(warehoused_date, '%m') AS warehoused_month, SUM(warehoused_quantity) FROM input GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(warehoused_date, '%m') ORDER BY warehoused_month;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(release_date, '%m') as release_month, SUM(release_quantity) FROM output WHERE release_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(release_date, '%m') ORDER BY release_month;
SELECT sum(o.release_quantity) AS releaseQuantity, w.warehouse_name FROM output o JOIN warehouse w ON o.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id GROUP BY warehouse_name;
